verbose_text: To determine whether apoptosis induction by Barkor knockdown and cisplatin treatment is ER- or mitochondrial related, western blotting was used to detect phospho-p38 MAPK, calpain, PARP, Bcl-2 and Bcl-xl levels in Saos-2 cells treated with Barkor knockdown and/or cisplatin treatment (1, 2 and 5 muM).
evidence: apoptosis induction by Barkor knockdown and cisplatin
